channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders start Thursday. Here’s your best chance of getting your hands on one
item.description: Nintendo hasn't raised prices on its new console—yet.

item.title: Europe: Show you’re serious about Ukraine by tightening sanctions on Russia
item.description: The EU bolsters Putin’s war machine by buying Russian energy, minerals, and metals, even as Russia's economy appears to falter.

item.title: Elon Musk says Tesla will have ‘thousands’ of Optimus robots by year’s end, but China slapping controls on rare earths is hobbling production
item.description: President Donald Trump’s punitive tariffs provoked Beijing into demonstrating one of its key points of leverage.

item.title: Billionaire Ken Griffin warns that U.S. brand is ‘eroding’
item.description: The Trump administration's tariff policies could impact the country's statute, according to Griffin.

item.title: Scott Bessent says the World Bank and IMF need a total overhaul: ‘Mission creep has knocked these institutions off course’
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, in remarks to the Institute of International Finance on Wednesday, said the two agencies are falling short.

item.title: Fed Beige Book says uncertainty from trade fights depresses economic outlook
The ‘Sell America’ trade may be on pause. But is the worst really over?
Has bitcoin halving lost its mojo?
Travelers’ newfound reluctance to visit U.S. could cost the economy $90 billion
Home buying and refi activity chilled as benchmark mortgage rate approaches 7%
